definition: according to a pattern/regular/orderly/structured/neat and tidy
exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb

sentences.english: The regulation of the steel slag particle was improved with grinding time.
sentences.chinese: 随着粉磨时间的延长，钢渣颗粒的规整度进一步提高。

sentences.english: Neat Vegetable Garden in the City of Nanking, China.
sentences.chinese: 南京城内一处规整的小菜园。

sentences.english: The use of regular packing and new inner parts in the modification of cuprammonia tower, as well as related achievement are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 论述规整填料和新型塔内件在铜洗塔改造中的效果。

sentences.english: Melon is oval, shape neat, beautiful of big fruit type stripe.
sentences.chinese: 瓜正椭圆形，果形规整，条纹美观属大果型。

sentences.english: The new process of domestic PA refining and the technique of high efficiency regular packing tower are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了国内苯酐精制新工艺和高效规整填料塔技术。

sentences.english: Bottom 6 teams burn, the whole device nail team spirit foot, make after god very neat.
sentences.chinese: 底部6个支钉支烧，整器神完气足，制作极其规整。

sentences.english: The technological charateristics and application advantages of stucture packing are expounded.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了规整填料塔的技术特性和应用优势。

sentences.english: They form genre of folksongs with exquisitely subtle tunes.
sentences.chinese: 它们节奏规整，曲调细腻委婉。

sentences.english: This technique could be a new route to synthesize arranged zeolitic materials without binder.
sentences.chinese: 是一种无粘合剂合成分子筛规整催化剂的一个新途径。

sentences.english: The column diameter can be kept constant by changing the corrugation angle of structured packing.
sentences.chinese: 通过改变波纹规整填料的倾角可以避免塔体变径。

sentences.english: The site is standard, long in the south-north direction.
sentences.chinese: 场地规整，南北进深较大。

definition: Fangzheng county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang
